response:
Here‚Äôs your detailed 1-day Paris itinerary from Delhi for 2 people, budgeted at ‚Çπ50,000 per person (total ‚Çπ1L). This plan is optimized for a quick, memorable Paris experience, considering international travel time constraints.

---

### Day 1: Paris Highlights in One Day

#### Morning
‚Ä¢ **Arrival & Breakfast at a Parisian Caf√©**  
  - Land at Charles de Gaulle Airport, freshen up  
  - Enjoy a classic French breakfast (croissant, coffee) at Caf√© de Flore or similar  
  - Duration: 1.5-2 hours  
  - Cost: ‚Çπ1,500 per person  
  - > **Transport:** RER B train from CDG to city center (‚Ç¨11, ~45 min)
  - > **Tip:** Use caf√© restrooms to freshen up after flight

‚Ä¢ **Eiffel Tower ‚Äì Iconic Visit**  
  - Stroll along the Seine toward the Eiffel Tower  
  - Take photos and optionally go up to the 2nd floor  
  - Duration: 2 hours  
  - Cost: ‚Çπ2,200-2,800 per person (entry + elevator)  
  - > **Transport:** Metro Line 6 to "Bir-Hakeim"  
  - > **Tip:** Buy tickets online for fastest entry

#### Afternoon
‚Ä¢ **Lunch ‚Äì Bistros Near Eiffel Tower** üçΩÔ∏è  
  - Sample French classics (quiche, steak frites)  
  - Cost: ‚Çπ2,500-3,000 per person  
  - > **Recommendation:** Le Bistro Parisien (river view), Caf√© Gustave

‚Ä¢ **Louvre Museum & Tuileries**  
  - Walk or taxi to the Louvre; see the Mona Lisa and highlights  
  - Relax in the adjacent Tuileries Garden  
  - Duration: 3 hours  
  - Cost: ‚Çπ2,000 per person (Louvre entry)  
  - > **Transport:** Metro Line 1 "Palais Royal‚ÄìMus√©e du Louvre"  
  - > **Booking:** Book Louvre entry slot online  
  - > **Tip:** Tuesday is Louvre closure, check your travel date.

#### Evening
‚Ä¢ **Seine River Cruise at Sunset**  
  - Classic Bateaux Mouches cruise: see Paris‚Äôs monuments illuminated  
  - Duration: 1 hour  
  - Cost: ‚Çπ1,500-2,200 per person  
  - > **Location:** Board near Pont de l‚ÄôAlma  
  - > **Tip:** Arrive 20 min early for best seating

‚Ä¢ **Dinner in the Latin Quarter**  
  - Enjoy lively ambiance, French or international cuisine  
  - Cost: ‚Çπ3,000 per person (mid-range bistro)  
  - > **Recommendation:** Le Procope or Les Papilles

‚Ä¢ **Evening Walk at Notre-Dame & √éle de la Cit√©**  
  - End the night with a stroll past Notre-Dame (outside, restoration ongoing)  
  - Duration: 45 min  
  - > **Transport:** Metro Line 4 "Cit√©" or walk from Latin Quarter

---

> **Getting Around:**  
Use a Paris Visite day pass for unlimited metro/bus rides. Taxis are available but metros are faster during day.

> **Dining:**  
French bistros: ‚Çπ2,500-3,000 per meal. Try a pastry at Pierre Herm√© or Ladur√©e for an evening snack.

> **Rainy Day Alternative:**  
Swap Seine cruise for Montparnasse Tower (Panoramic indoor Paris view, ‚Çπ1,500 per person).

---

### Budget Breakdown (per person in ‚Çπ, converted from euros):

- **Flights:** ‚Çπ37,000-40,000 (roundtrip, economy on low-cost/connecting; check on cheapoair.com)
- **Local Transport:** ‚Çπ1,200
- **Food:** ‚Çπ8,000
- **Activities:**  
  - Eiffel Tower: ‚Çπ2,500  
  - Louvre: ‚Çπ2,000  
  - Seine cruise: ‚Çπ2,000  
- **Misc/Shopping:** ‚Çπ2,500  
- **TOTAL:** Around ‚Çπ50,000 per person

---

### Essential Tips

- **Payments:** Most places accept cards, keep some cash for caf√©s and metro.
- **Connectivity:** Buy an eSIM or airport SIM for data.
- **Safety:** Paris is safe, but keep valuables close (beware of pickpockets around tourist spots).
- **Luggage:** Use airport storage if not staying overnight.

---

### Pre-Trip Checklist

- Confirm flight timings on cheapoair.com
- Pre-book major attractions (Eiffel Tower, Louvre, Seine cruise)
- Photocopy travel documents
- Download Google Maps/Paris Metro app
- Carry a universal plug adapter

---

üí° **Travel Essentials:** Check visa requirements for France based on your nationality. Apply 2-3 weeks before departure.

---

Have an amazing whirlwind day discovering Paris! If you‚Äôd like adjustments, just let me know.

placesOfInterest.description: Iconic Paris landmark and must-see attraction.
World-famous art museum housing the Mona Lisa.
Historic public garden adjacent to the Louvre.
River running through Paris; popular for scenic cruises.
Vibrant dining and cultural neighborhood.
Famed cathedral and historic island in central Paris.
Classic Parisian caf√© for breakfast experience.
Indoor panoramic view alternative in bad weather.
Famous patisseries for pastries/macarons.
